name: bootstrap-website
description: Bootstraps a website with webpack, mustache, firebase, etc

scripts.build: rm -r dist && mkdir dist && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp sitemap.xml dist && yarn mustache && $(npm bin)/webpack --optimize-minimize
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production yarn build && firebase deploy && growlnotify -m 'front deployed ðŸš€'
scripts.install:skeleton: mkdir .tmp && git clone https://github.com/whatsnewsaes/Skeleton-Sass .tmp && cp -r .tmp/scss src/scss/skeleton && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.mustache:partials: for file in $(cd src/html/partials; ls *.mustache); do partials="$partials -p src/html/partials/$file"; done; echo $partials
scripts.mustache: for file in $(cd src/html/pages; ls -d */ | cut -f1 -d'/'); do mustache -p ./src/html/pages/$file/content.mustache $(npm run mustache:partials -s) $(npm run mustache:apply-config -s -- $file > dist/config.json; echo dist/config.json) ./src/html/template.mustache > ./dist/$file.html; rm dist/config.json; done
scripts.firebase-clean-urls: for file in $(cd src/html/pages; ls -d */ | cut -f1 -d'/'); do json=$json'{"source": "'"/$file"'", "destination": "'"/$file.html"'"},'; done; echo "[$(echo $json | rev | cut -c2- | rev)]"
scripts.webpack-clean-urls: for file in $(cd src/html/pages; ls -d */ | cut -f1 -d'/'); do json=$json'{"from": "'"/$file"'", "to": "'"/$file.html"'"},'; done; echo "[$(echo $json | rev | cut -c2- | rev)]"

author: Damien Bry
